dcterms:creator: Naoki Kannan
Yohei Seki
dcterms:description: A carefully curated dataset utilizing Japanese annual securities reports to support the ESG impact type identification objective, categorizing news articles or sentences into 'Opportunity', 'Risk', or 'Cannot Distinguish'. In the Japanese dataset, these labels are represented as 'Positive', 'Negative', and 'N/A'.
dcterms:title: ML-ESG-2 Dataset
